formalpara.title: Figure 7. An alternative operon.
formalpara.para: hdac-6, which encodes a histone deacetylase, can be processed in either of two ways. When exon 9 is skipped, a full length hdac-6 mRNA is synthesized by splicing exon 8 to exon 10. When exon 8 is spliced to exon 9, 3' end formation at the end of exon 9 occurs and is accompanied by SL2 trans-splicing just downstream, at the 5' end of exon 10, thereby creating a nine-exon upstream mRNA and a two-exon downstream mRNA.
